Posts.Content: Hello seaspirit44, Thanks for your reply, I appreciate it. Sounds like you've had quite a journey.  All the best with the rest to come! :)
Posts.Title: Switching from private to NHS

Posts.Content: Hello, I was wondering if anyone has had any experience in swapping from private to NHS treatment, in my case it would be for radiotherapy?  What would be the differences between the two, probably in terms of appointments, doctors...? Or anything else anyone has had experience of. Many thanks :)
